title: C.O. Bigelow Pharmacy
description: C.O. Bigelow Pharmacy is the nation's oldest apothecary, taking care of New York since 1838. Combining 180 years of experience with state-of-the-art technology, our legendary Greenwich Village pharmacy brings a personal touch to modern medicine.
cleaned_text: Contact LOCATION 414 Sixth Avenue New York, NY 10011 HOURS M-F: 9am - 7pm Sat: 9am - 4pm CONTACT Rx@COBigelow.com (212) 533-2700 Serving New York Since 1838. Combining 183 years of experience with state-of-the-art technology, our legendary Greenwich Village pharmacy brings a personal touch to modern medicine. Open seven days a week, 365 days a year, our pharmacists are always available to help with anything and everything you may need. "If you can't find it anywhere else, try Bigelow's!" Open 7 days a week, 365 days a year, whenever you need us! Let us help you take control of your health through our variety of services... Accepting all major insurance plans including Medicare Part D Medication Synchronization and Adherence Packaging Medication flavoring in a variety of flavors for humans (bubblegum, grape, strawberry, banana, etc.) and animals (beef, chicken, tuna, etc.) Compounding of medications for humans and pets Extensive selection of homeopathic remedies and products Technology to help you determine the best Medicare Part D plan for you Disposal of expired and unused medications in an environmentally-friendly way Delivery of prescription drugs and OTCs Wide range of HIV medications Ability to quickly obtain hard-to-find medications Comprehensive selection of OTC medications and vitamins Medication Therapy Management and Complete Medication Review Vaccination administration on-site including flu, shingles, pneumonia, meningococcal, and Tdap (tetanus, diphtheria, and pertussis) Mobile App to manage refills, view your medication profile, and securely message the pharmacy Take Control of Your Health. Use the form below to reach out to our pharmacy team for anything you may need.
